name: UX Manuel For Starters
description:
Have you been having challenges or feeling overwhelmed trying to document your UX process? Join my group session where I talk about the newly designed Manual to help guide you in your UX process and documentation.


The UX Manual for Starters is for beginners in the UX design and UX Research processes. The guide helps you document your process product overview, product market, product problems, product goals, product features, research observations, insights, proposed solutions, prioritized problem, user story, information architecture, task flow, sketch ideas, challenges and improvements.
